document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution. West Palaearctic (excluding north); introduced to Australia (
Swirepik et al . 2008
; Gültekin & Fremuth 2013 )

Material examined.
165 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , ZMUK , ZMUM , IMC ) including:
Cherkasy Prov
.:
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Horodyshche Distr. , Mlyiv ,
25.vi.1921
;
1 spec. ( ZMUK ) Kanyv , Bilyashivsky gully, N.D. Globova leg.,
9.vi.1952
;
1 spec. ( ZMUK ) Kanyv Distr. , Besarabia , N.D. Globova leg.,
1.vi.1948
;
2 spec. ( ZIN ) Zvenyhorodka Distr. , Murzyntsi , V . A. Karavayev leg.;
Chernihiv Prov
.:
2 spec. ( ZMUM ) Varva Distr. , Bohdany , A.N. Bolbas leg.,
7.vi.1998
; Kherson Prov. :
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Kherson , G.A. Romanov ,
20–30.iv.1934
;
1 spec. ( IMC ) Tsyurupinsk , I. V . Maltzev leg.,
28.v1959
;
1 spec. ( IMC ) idem,
on
Onopordum
,
15.vi.1962
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Oleshky , D. Znoyko ,
5.v.1924
;
1 spec. ( ZMUK ) Velyka Lepetykha Distr. , windbreak near Kakhovske reservoir,
28.vi.1965
;
3 spec. ( SIZK ) Hola Pristan Distr. , Black Sea Biosphere Reserve , Ivano-Rybalchanskyi Division ,
on
Onopordum acanthium , S.V. Volovnik
leg.,
15.vii.1982
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Tsyurupinsk Distr. , Radensk , Forestry, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
17.v.1982
;
1m
,
1f ( SIZK ) Bilozerka Distr. , Olexandrivka , marine coast, in copula , S. V . Volovnik leg.,
23.v.1982
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Skadovsk env., S. V . Volovnik leg.,
19.v.1982
; Kropyvnytskyi Prov. :
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Dobrovelichkivka , S. V . Volovnik leg.,
15.vii.1983
; Mykolaiv Prov. :
5 spec. ( SIZK ) Mykolayiv Distr. , Starobohdanivka , Petrenko leg.,
7.v1978
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Mykolayiv Distr. , Kuripchyno , M. Nesterov leg.,
25.v.1980
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Nova Odesa Distr. , Sebeno, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
25.v.1982
; Poltava Prov .:
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Poltava env., Th. Lukjanovitsh leg.,
27.vi.1926
; ( ZIN )
idem.,
5vi.1925
;
4 spec. ( ZIN ) Poltava , Th. Lukjanovitsh leg.,
v.1922
;
2 spec. ( ZIN ) idem.,
28.x.1922
;
2 spec. ( ZIN ) idem.,
16.v1923
.

Biology. Grasslands, ruderal habitats. Adults occur in IV–VII. Oligophagous on
Onopordum
spp. ( Asteraceae ) (
Batra et al . 1981
;
Briese et al . 2004
; Briese 1996b ).
